entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Snow or periods of ice pellets in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
